      • attack

        public GameEvent attack(Player attacker,
               boolean canAlienIncreaseSpeed)
        Function that performs the attack request of a player First it checks for every player that he has the same position of the attacked sector. If so, he's put into an array, but if the player has got a defence item, he will not be added. Instead, a defenceitem from his array will be removed, and this if info is logged into the IllegalActionEvent message
        Parameters:
        Player - that request the attack, flag that checks if the AlienPlayer can increase the speed
        Returns:
        IllegalActionEvent if the attack isn't successful, SuccessfulAttackEvent if the attack has killed someone, along with the attacked players

      • hasPlayerInSectorDefenceItem

        public boolean hasPlayerInSectorDefenceItem(Player player)
        Function that checks if the player has a defence item in his ownedItems array
        Parameters:
        Player - to be checked
        Returns:
        true if player has a defenceitem, false if not

      • removePlayerFromArray

        Returns:
        true if player is found and removed, false if not

      • removeItemfromPlayer

        public Item removeItemfromPlayer(Player player,
                        Item item)
        Function that removes a player's item from the ownedItems array of the player
        Parameters:
        Player's - item to be removed
        Returns:
        Item removed if the player's item is found and removed, false if not

      • giveItemsTo

        public GameEvent giveItemsTo(Player player,
                    java.util.List<Item> itemsList)
        Function that is invoked when the player has too many items and one must be removed from his deck. The new itemsList is parsed upon the player's one. If it's not empty, the items are rearranged and an event is returned.
        Parameters:
        Player - to which look his itemsList, new itemsList to be parsed.
        Returns:
        SuccessfulGivenItemListEvent if player's item list is found and rearranged IllegalActionEvent if not

      • getPlayersInPositionAndAdjacent

        public java.util.List<Player> getPlayersInPositionAndAdjacent(Sector sector)
        Function that is invoked when a player uses a Spotlight Item . It searches for all the players in the sector selected by the player and returns all the players in that position or the six adjacent.
        Parameters:
        sector - to check
        Returns:
        temp (list of of players, adjacent or in position)
